verses.verse: Now I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> four <S%H702><s%> chariots <S%H4818><s%> were coming <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> mountains; <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> [were] bronze <S%H5178><s%> mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
With the first <S%H7223><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> [were] red <S%H122><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> with the second <S%H8145><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> black <S%H7838><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%>

with the third <S%H7992><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> and with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> strong <S%H554><s%> dappled <S%H1261><s%> horses. <S%H5483><s%>
Then I spoke <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me, "What <S%H4100><s%> are these, <S%H428><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%>?"

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, "These <S%H428><s%> are the four <S%H702><s%> spirits <S%H7307><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> standing <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%>

with one of which <S%H834><s%> the black <S%H7838><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> are going <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> country; <S%H776><s%> and the white <S%H3836><s%> ones <S%H3836><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H413><s%> <S%H310><s%> them, while the dappled <S%H1261><s%> ones <S%H1261><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to the south <S%H8486><s%> country. <S%H776><s%>

"When the strong <S%H554><s%> ones <S%H554><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out, they were eager <S%H1245><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> to patrol <S%H1980><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>" And He said, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> patrol <S%H1980><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>" So they patrolled <S%H1980><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then He cried <S%H2199><s%> out to me and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%> "See, <S%H7200><s%> those who are going <S%H3318><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> have appeased <S%H5117><s%> My wrath <S%H7307><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the north. <S%H6828><s%>"
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> also came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> [an offering] from the exiles, <S%H1473><s%> from Heldai, <S%H2469><s%> Tobijah, <S%H2900><s%> and Jedaiah; <S%H3048><s%> and you go <S%H935><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and enter <S%H935><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah, <S%H6846><s%> where <S%H834><s%> they have arrived <S%H935><s%> from Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

"And take <S%H3947><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> an [ornate] crown, <S%H5850><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> [it] on the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest. <S%H3548><s%>

"Then say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Branch, <S%H6780><s%> for He will branch <S%H6779><s%> out from where <S%H8478><s%> He is; and He will build <S%H1129><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Yes, it is He who will build <S%H1129><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and He who will bear <S%H5375><s%> the honor <S%H1935><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> and rule <S%H4910><s%> on His throne. <S%H3678><s%> Thus, He will be a priest <S%H3548><s%> on His throne, <S%H3678><s%> and the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> will be between <S%H996><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> offices."'

"Now the crown <S%H5850><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a reminder <S%H2146><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Helem, <S%H2494><s%> Tobijah, <S%H2900><s%> Jedaiah, <S%H3048><s%> and Hen <S%H2581><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah. <S%H6846><s%>

"And those who <S%H7350><s%> are far <S%H7350><s%> off will come <S%H935><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>" Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you. And it will take <S%H1961><s%> place, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you completely <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
